data.message: I know shady that you won't answer me but I'm not Stan who waited your answer .. I'm just a guy who want you to wake up and listen .. you're not a god you're just a creature got talent don't let your evil win .. you know deep inside there's only one god who crest us all .. your life and after life will be real heaven if you believe .. I know how it goes when reach the fame .. but start all over again .. that's the only life we have .. don't waist it on the devil fantasy .. tame your own monster and unleash the good inside you .. if you die you will know deep inside where you will be .. redirect your talent cause I believe in you.

am not religion man .. his talent is phenomenon but if he talks about things which make people do better he will be like no one else of the rappers of all times , that's my openion and no hard feelings cause I love peace .. I don't hate or envy I just wanna see peace all around the world
